summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBubble's Level Up Balancing Moisturizer is a revitalizing daily gel moisturizer that provides lightweight, shine-free hydration, leaving skin feeling hydrated, comfortable, and fresh.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor oily, combination, and normal skin types.Gel texture.Fragrance free.Key IngredientsZinc PCA + Niacinamide help improve texture and radiance.Yarrow Extract helps heal and restore moisture.Our Bluelight Protection is a superfood protein compound helps protect against + repair blue light damage.Formulated WithoutDenatured alcoholsParabensArtificial colorAdded fragranceItem 2600869How To UseAfter toner, apply 1-2 pumps to clean, dry skin. Use morning and night for soft, balanced skin.Precautions: Use only as directed.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Oleyl Erucate, Niacinamide, Zinc PCA, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Glucose, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Succinate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Squalane, Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: After toner, apply 1-2 pumps to clean, dry skin. Use morning and night for soft, balanced skin.Precautions: Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: bubble skincare
reviews.comments: this skincare helped my skin ever since I used it ive barley broken out i havent gotten tons of pimples and my skin is very clear.

reviews.headline: Great for Sensitive Skin & Kids!
reviews.comments: This lightweight moisturizer works so well on my kids who have very sensitive skin. It layers well with sunscreen and really soaks into the skin. I love the easy to use dispense system so they can't over apply. The price point is perfect for our budget conscious family as well. Highly recommend this and more from Bubble!

reviews.headline: Love the texture but it BURNS
reviews.comments: I LOVE bubble ive bever had a bad product till this.. When i first swatched this on my hand after buying i thought it felt nice, later that night i put it on before bed and immediately i starting itching my face. It felt like tiny little prickles all over my face. I washed my face but it still hurts.

reviews.headline: Level up your skin by using this

I know why it is called level up because it levels up your skin by so much. The only con is that it kind of smells like Play-Doh when you apply it on your face

reviews.headline: Awful texture and smell

reviews.headline: Smells
reviews.comments: I always try to hold my breath when applying this, doesn't help. Feels fresh on the skin but also, doesn't feel full coverage.

reviews.headline: This stinks, literally‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: This product smells awful. I cant get past the smell. Its giving very plastic smell. Not sure if its a bad batch or something but man this stuff has a smell i cant get past lol i even tried plumping some product to see if it was just the surface that wasnt mixed properly but nopeeeee. If you can get past the smell give it a shot it kept my oils at bay all day i will say. Im in arizona heat so its super dry out here but with my combo skin this stuff seems to do the job. So far no break outs but i havent used it long enough to really determine that.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: This might be good for someone younger with very oily or acne prone skin. This left my skin feeling dry and craving more moisture. Not like other gel creams I've tried.

reviews.comments: I would recommend this product it feels amazing on my skin and is very moisturizing. It is also pretty affordable. I love this and i do recommend.

Absolutely way too much than I probably should love the skin care product. It is brilliant fortravels and very, very hydrating and really helps clear up your skin.

reviews.headline: Great for sensitive, acne-prone but SMELLS!
reviews.comments: I was so frustrated trying to find a good moisturizer that suited my skin type which is very difficult for sensitive, acne-prone & was happy when i found this one. I used it for almost a yr before i noticed a bad, play-doh-like smell and this was a brand new bottle. I started breaking out in areas i don't normally get pimples. I havent found a moisturizer that suits my skin since. They must have changed formulas. So disappointed‚Ä¶

media.headline: I would buy this product again and i recommend it for sensit
I would buy this product again and i recommend it for sensit
Amazing for oily skin and breakouts

faceoff_positive.comments: A few years ago, I developed extremely sensitive eczema and rosacea prone skin out of nowhere. I'm sure my skin conditions are symptoms of my autoimmune conditions because I also get hormonal acne that's almost impossible to treat topically.      My usual skincare products are around 3x the price than this, and I hadn't even heard of this brand, let alone considered trying it before a friend recommended it to me. And honestly, despite the good ingredient list, I really wasn't expecting anything when I first tried it. But shockingly, I loved everything I got.      I started out applying this as one of the last steps in my routine before bed, and I was amazed at how this lightweight moisturizer was able to keep my skin supple throughout the night. But don't get me wrong, I wouldn't consider this product an occlusive at all. it's more hydrating than moisturizing.      I grab for now during the day now as well. I actually prefer it more for daytime use. Currently, summer's just beginning and the weather in my area is already a sweltering, humid 95 degrees. I love applying this in the morning because it has such a refreshing, cooling, silky, gel-like formula that doesn't pill, feel heavy under or sweats your makeup off, or cause any extra oiliness throughout the day. It feels even better kept in the fridge!     For reference, the formula/ texture/ results of this moisturizer is very comparable to Purito's Sea Buckthorn Vital 70 Cream and their Deep Sea Pure Water Cream.      This's great for those who have combination or oilier skin types and want hydration without feeling weighed down. However, if you have broken skin or a compromised/ damaged skin barrier, like from eczema or something, this may sting a little when first applied. I mean for the price point, it's amazing!
faceoff_positive.headline: Shocked

faceoff_negative.comments: I had had great luck with every Bubble product so far, so I was bummed that this was a miss for me.  It stung on application, which wasn't a good first sign. The formula is nice and lightweight on the fingertips, and I like that the packaging gives you a perfect dose. Unfortunately there was a layer that just sat on my skin all day and never quite fully absorbed. It does a great job at controlling oil, but after a few days my skin started drying out. Lastly, I started breaking out in the little red spots that for me indicate a reaction. After that I had to switch back to my old moisturizer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for me
